articles.author: Niamh Kennedy
articles.title: Poland, Slovakia, and Hungary to defy EU and extend ban on Ukrainian grain imports - CNN
articles.description: Poland, Hungary, and Slovakia will defy the European Union and extend a temporary ban placed on Ukrainian grain imports, in a move likely to anger the bloc’s leadership.
articles.content:
Poland, Hungary, and Slovakia will defy the European Union and extend a temporary ban placed on Ukrainian grain imports, in a move likely to anger the blocs leadership.
